pages.title: Modular Explosives
pages.text: Highly modular explosives, consisting of:\- an [#](449900)Archetype[#]() (damaging entities, destroying blocks, both, or just purely cosmetic)\- and [#](449900)Modifiers[#]() (changing the damage type, lighting fire, increasing the blast radius, damage and much more)

pages.title: Customization
pages.text: Use the [Pigment Pedestal](entry://general/pedestal) to combine a Modular Explosive with items specifying Archetype and to add Modifiers.\\You can customize a whole stack of explosives at once.

A magic mine that, once placed, primes after a few seconds and explodes at first touch, dealing a huge chunk of damage. Use a [Midnight Chip](entry://magical_blocks/midnight_solution@midnight_chip) to disarm and safely dismantle it.
A multifunctional explosive, which can be placed on walls and detonated, as well as thrown. Harmless to living beings by default.

pages.title: Archetypes
pages.text: - Gunpowder: Destroying Blocks\- Glowstone Dust: Dealing Damage\- Midnight Aberration: Both\\You can also combine both separately.

pages.title: General Mod. (∞)
pages.text: - TNT: Increased radius\- Chorus Fruit: Starry Particles\- Shimmerstone: Placement of invisible lights

pages.title: Damage Type Mod. (1)
pages.text: - Fire Charge: Fire\- Doombloom Seed: Primordial Fire\- Storm Stone: Lightning Damage\- Neolith: Magic Damage\- Incandescent Amalgam: Incandescent Damage

pages.title: Damage Mod. (∞)
pages.text: - End Rod: Greatly increased damage when near explosion center

pages.title: Mining Mod. (∞)
pages.text: - Stratine Fragments: Square block breaking shape\- Four Leaf Clover: Fortune\- Mermaids Gem: Silk Touch\- Ender Pearl: Inventory Insertion

pages.title: Starting from Scratch
pages.text: Modular Explosives come with a suitable archetype builtin. Though if you want to change that, put it into the [Pigment Pedestal](entry://general/pedestal) to [#](449900)clear both Archetype and Modifiers[#]() and start from scratch.
